Text: Loved the Book By heinlein, thought the 1st movie was good even though it wasn't a direct adaptation, but these I have never read!  I will enjoy them!  Great UL!!  Thanks.

@Mothra67

I actually read somewhere that the book had almost no action and that most of the book is told through flashbacks. The movies are pretty good, the first two I enjoyed, didn't really find the dark humor in the third movie enjoyable though. I heard the animated movie was pretty good though! and no problem!
